spells.name: Bless
spells.basic_level: One friendly target unit inflicts maximum damage when it attacks
spells.advanced_level: One friendly target unit inflicts maximum damage +1 when it attacks
spells.expert_level: All friendly units' inflict maximum damage +1 when they attack

spells.name: Cure
spells.basic_level: Removes all negative spell effects from target, allied troop and heals it for ((Power x 5) + 10) health points
spells.advanced_level: Removes all negative spell effects from target, allied troop and heals it for ((Power x 5) + 20) health points
spells.expert_level: Removes all negative spell effects from all allied troops and heals each for ((Power x 5) + 30) health points

spells.name: Dispel
spells.basic_level: Removes all spell effects from target, allied creature troop
spells.advanced_level: Removes all spell effects from target allied or enemy creature troop
spells.expert_level: Removes all spell effects from all creatures on the battlefield

spells.name: Protection From Water
spells.basic_level: Damage from Water Magic spells is reduced by 30% for target, allied troop
spells.advanced_level: Damage from Water Magic spells is reduced by 50% for target, allied troop
spells.expert_level: Damage from Water Magic spells is reduced by 50% for all allied troops

spells.name: Summon Boat
spells.basic_level: Summons one of your hero's boats to their current location. If none of those boats are available, then one of your other heroes' boats is summoned. Spell has a 50% chance of working. The spell fails if there are no unoccupied boats available
spells.advanced_level: Same as Basic effect, except that if no boats are available, a new one is created. The spell has a 75% chance of working. There are a maximum of sixty-four boats allowed on the Adventure Map at one time. The spell fails if all are occupied
spells.expert_level: Same as Advanced effect, except that the spell has a 100% chance of working (unless all sixty-four boats are occupied)

spells.name: Ice Bolt
spells.basic_level: One enemy target unit receives ((Power x 20) + 10) damage
spells.advanced_level: One enemy target unit receives ((Power x 20) + 20) damage
spells.expert_level: One enemy target unit receives ((Power x 20) + 50) damage

spells.name: Remove Obstacle
spells.basic_level: Removes one, non-magic obstacle from the battlefield. Integrated obstacles, such as cliffs are not affected
spells.advanced_level: Same as Basic effect, except Fire Walls may also be removed
spells.expert_level: Same as Advanced effect, except all, non-integrated obstacles can be removed

spells.name: Scuttle Boat
spells.basic_level: Spell has 50% chance of destroying a boat, unless occupied
spells.advanced_level: Spell has a 75% chance of destroying a boat, unless occupied
spells.expert_level: Spell destroys a boat, unless occupied

spells.name: Weakness
spells.basic_level: One enemy target unit's attack rating is reduced by three
spells.advanced_level: Same as Basic effect, except attack rating is reduced by six
spells.expert_level: All enemy units' attack ratings are reduced by six

spells.name: Forgetfulness
spells.basic_level: Half of the creatures in target, enemy troop, with ranged attack forget to shoot
spells.advanced_level: Target, enemy troop with ranged attack cannot use its ranged attack
spells.expert_level: All enemy troops with ranged attacks cannot use their ranged attacks

spells.name: Frost Ring
spells.basic_level: Troops in hexes surrounding target hex receive ((Power x 10) + 15) in damage. Target hex is unaffected
spells.advanced_level: Same as Basic effect, except damage is ((Power x 10) + 30)
spells.expert_level: Same as Basic effect, except damage is ((Power x 10) + 60)

spells.name: Mirth
spells.basic_level: One friendly target unit's morale is increased by one
spells.advanced_level: One friendly target unit's morale is increased by two
spells.expert_level: All friendly units' morale is increased by two

spells.name: Teleport
spells.basic_level: Target, friendly troop instantly moves to an unoccupied target hex. Troop cannot teleport over walls or moats
spells.advanced_level: Same as Basic effect, except troop can teleport over walls
spells.expert_level: Troop can move to any unoccupied hex

spells.name: Clone
spells.basic_level: Creates a duplicate of target, friendly troop level 1-5. The duplicate can attack but is dispelled if it receives any damage
spells.advanced_level: Same as Basic effect, except the duplicate may be of a level 1-6 troop
spells.expert_level: Same as Basic effect, except the duplicate may be of a level 1-7 troop

spells.name: Prayer
spells.basic_level: One friendly unit's attack, defense, and speed (hexes per turn) ratings are increased by two
spells.advanced_level: One friendly unit's attack, defense, and speed ratings are increased by four
spells.expert_level: All friendly units' attack, defense, and speed ratings are increased by four

spells.name: Water Walk
spells.basic_level: The casting hero may follow a movement path across water, provided the end destination is an unoccupied location on land. Water movement may be up to 60% of the hero's normal movement
spells.advanced_level: Same as Basic effect, except that water movement may be up to 80% of the hero's normal movement
spells.expert_level: Same as Basic effect, except that water movement may be made at the hero's full, normal movement

spells.name: Summon Water Elemental
spells.basic_level: A troop containing (Power x 2) water elementals appears on the side of the casting player. Only one type of elemental can be summoned
spells.advanced_level: Same as Basic effect, except that (Power x 3) water elementals are summoned
spells.expert_level: Same as Basic effect, except that (Power x 4) water elementals are summoned
